caption.p: Differential responses of nodal segments of Phyllanthus amarus obtained with individual or mixed treatments with 2,4-dichlorophenoxyacetic acid (2,4-D) and 6-benzyladenine (BA) (mg/L): T1, free of phytoregulators (control); T2, BA 1.0; T3, BA 2.0; 0.25 mg/L 2,4-D (T4) + BA 1.0 (T5) or 2.0 (T6); 0.50 mg/L 2,4-D (T7) + BA 1.0 (T8) or 2.0 (T9); 0.75 mg/L 2,4-D (T10) + BA 1.0 (T11) or 2.0 (T12). White bar = 1.0 cm.
